                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                     int duration)
        set frequency alerts with given information for a given event
        Parameters:
        event - the event which the new alert to be attached to
        name - the name of the new alert
        time - the triggered time of the new alert
        duration - how many hours is there between one alert and the next alert.
